item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行必须保持耐心才能完全实现 2% 的物价目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）说，欧洲中央银行在降低通胀方面取得了良好进展，但要完全达到 2% 的目标还需要耐心。【原文：The European Central Bank has made good progress in bringing inflation down, but needs patience to fully reach the 2% target, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 美联储降息前美国抵押贷款利率降至两年低点
item.description: 由于预期美联储将降息，上周美国抵押贷款利率降至 2022 年 9 月以来的最低水平，这刺激了购房和再融资申请的大量涌入。【原文：US mortgage rates declined last week to the lowest level since September 2022 in anticipation of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, stoking an influx of applications for home purchases and refinancing.】

item.title: 前 Coinbase 员工推出专注于稳定币的加密货币交易所
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.的两名前高级雇员正在推出一个名为 TrueX 的加密货币平台，该平台将使用贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：Two former high level Coinbase Global Inc. employees are launching a cryptocurrency platform called TrueX that will use PayPal Holdings Inc.’s stablecoin as its preferred token for transactions.】

item.title: TechInsights 称，YMTC 利用中国工具推进芯片技术发展
item.description: 根据 TechInsights 的最新研究，中国扬子江存储科技股份有限公司（Yangtze Memory Technologies Co.【原文：China’s Yangtze Memory Technologies Co. has made progress in replacing foreign chipmaking technology with homegrown alternatives and its latest storage products now rival global market leaders, according to new research from TechInsights.】

item.title: 尽管增长前景不明，杰尼亚首席执行官仍对中国充满信心
item.description: 在纽约上市的意大利时装公司杰尼亚（Ermenegildo Zegna），尽管经济复苏的时机尚不明朗，但仍坚持其在中国的中期扩张计划。【原文：Ermenegildo Zegna, the Italian fashion house listed in New York, is sticking with its expansion plans for China over the medium term despite uncertain timing on a possible economic recovery.】

item.title: 甲骨文人工智能驱动的增长令华尔街多年来最为看好
item.description: 甲骨文公司正在赢得投资者和分析师的青睐，因为它看到了人工智能需求推动的销售增长复苏。【原文：Oracle Corp. is winning over investors and analysts as it sees a resurgence in sales growth driven by artificial intelligence-fueled demand.】

item.title: 七月伦敦房价下跌，与全国形势背道而驰
item.description: 由于工党新政府税收计划的不确定性影响了首都的情绪，7 月份伦敦的房价出现回调。【原文：House prices in London backtracked in July as uncertainty around the tax plans of the new Labour government weighed on sentiment in the capital.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。今天（终于）是美联储日，市场情绪谨慎。与此同时，一些大公司警告不要过于兴奋。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. It is (finally) Fed day and markets are in a cautious mood. Meanwhile, big names are warning against getting too excited. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 面条亿万富翁计划在 2025 年为印度部门进行首次公开募股前融资
item.description: 在印度市场掀起首次公开募股热潮之际，尼泊尔企业集团 CG Corp Global 正计划于 2025 年初为其印度分部进行上市前筹资，该分部生产广受欢迎的方便面品牌 Wai Wai。【原文：The Nepalese conglomerate CG Corp Global is planning a pre-listing fundraise in early 2025 for its India unit that makes the popular instant noodle brand Wai Wai, amid a frenzy of initial public offerings in the Indian market.】

item.title: 组建政府谈判受阻，法国总理就预算问题发出警告
item.description: 法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）就法国公共财政问题发出警告，因为敌对党派之间在税收和支出问题上的分歧使其组建政府的任务进一步复杂化。【原文：French Prime Minister Michel Barnier issued a warning over the country’s public finances as disagreements between rival parties on tax and spending further complicate his task of forming a government.】

item.title: 金巴利首席执行官离职为简短而价值缩水的篇章画上句号
item.description: Davide Campari NV 公司首席执行官在执掌公司仅五个月后辞职，结束了这家意大利阿培罗酒生产商的投资者没有回报的时期。【原文：The resignation of Davide Campari NV’s chief executive officer after only five months at the helm ends an unrewarding period for investors in the Italian maker of Aperol.】

item.title: 花旗证券搁置加入美联储债券交易商行列的计划
item.description: Citadel Securities 已悄然搁置加入华尔街最著名俱乐部之一的计划：直接与美联储进行交易的债券交易商行列。【原文：Citadel Securities has quietly shelved plans to join one of Wall Street’s most prominent clubs: The ranks of bond dealers that trade directly with the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 美国在不到十年内面临 600 万劳动力缺口
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，美国雇主将在十年内面临约 600 万工人的短缺。【原文：US employers will confront a shortage of some 6 million workers within a decade, according to a new study.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利看好欧洲国防股反弹
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示，欧洲防务股应受益于各国重新储备捐赠给乌克兰的设备，并寻求减少对美国的依赖，从而从大跌中反弹。【原文：European defense stocks rebounded from a selloff after Morgan Stanley said the industry should benefit from countries restocking equipment they’ve donated to Ukraine and seeking to reduce their dependence on the US.】

item.title: Vanguard 买入美元，称美联储降息押注过高
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司之一 Vanguard 本周买入美元，认为市场对美联储降息的押注过高。【原文：Vanguard, one of the world’s biggest asset managers, is buying the dollar this week on the view that market bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts are overdone.】

item.title: 英国央行警告：货币市场存在 "重大 "结算风险
item.description: 英格兰银行表示，每天都有大量货币交易面临失败的风险，这将是今年行业行为准则审查的重点。【原文：A sizable amount of currency trades are at risk of failure every day and this will be a key focus for an industry code of conduct review this year, the Bank of England said.】

item.title: 降息规模之争终将结束，交易员锁定美联储赌注
item.description: 疯狂押注美联储四年来首次降息幅度的债券投资者即将发现，他们的交易是否正确。【原文：Bond investors that have been frantically wagering on the size of the Federal Reserve’s first interest-rate cut in four years are about to find out whether they made the right trade.】

item.title: 中国假日消费增长昙花一现令市场忧心忡忡
item.description: 在本周的一个重要节假日期间，中国的消费从大流行前的水平略有回升，但这一回升并没有动摇投资者对中国日益加深的经济困境的担忧。【原文：Chinese consumption edged up slightly during a major holiday this week from its pre-pandemic level, a rebound that didn’t sway investors still fixated on the extent of the country’s deepening economic woes.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚为非洲赢得 50 万支甲痘疫苗订单
item.description: 疫苗联盟 Gavi 正在向 Bavarian Nordic A/S 购买 50 万支麻风腮疫苗，用于受致命疾病爆发影响最严重的非洲国家。【原文：Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, is purchasing 500,000 mpox vaccines from Bavarian Nordic A/S for African countries hardest-hit by the lethal outbreak of the disease that causes lesions that can also result in blindness and disfigurement.】

item.title: 印尼意外降息可能刺激资金流入，支撑印尼盾
item.description: 分析师和策略师认为，印尼央行意外降息可能会导致更多外资流入债券，并最终支撑印尼盾。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s surprise interest-rate cut may lead to higher foreign inflows into bonds and end up supporting the rupiah, according analysts and strategists.】

item.title: 迪斯尼印度分公司要求 Zee 赔偿 9.4 亿美元
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司的印度分公司要求 Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. 公司赔偿损失 9.4 亿美元，从而延长了与这家总部位于孟买的广播公司之间的法律纠纷，因为该公司拖欠了板球比赛电视转播权的费用。【原文：The Indian unit of Walt Disney Co. has sought $940 million in damages from Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd., stretching out a legal battle with the Mumbai-based broadcaster after it defaulted on payment for TV rights of cricket matches.】

item.title: 印度考虑放宽对非巴斯马蒂大米的出口限制
item.description: 印度食品部长桑吉夫-乔普拉（Sanjeev Chopra）周三在新德里表示，印度正在考虑放宽对非巴斯马蒂大米海外运输的限制。【原文：India is mulling easing restrictions on overseas shipments of non-basmati rice, Food Secretary Sanjeev Chopra said in New Delhi on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌赢得 15 亿欧元欧盟广告反垄断罚单之战
item.description: 谷歌因阻碍网络广告竞争而被欧盟罚款 15 亿欧元（17 亿美元），在与欧盟的法庭斗争中获胜，这在一定程度上弥补了上周因滥用垄断权力而在另一项判决中惨败的损失。【原文：Google won a court fight with the European Union over a €1.5 billion ($1.7 billion) fine for thwarting competition for online ads, partly atoning for last week’s crushing defeat in a separate judgment for abusing its monopoly powers.】

item.title: 荷兰要求欧盟退出《移民与庇护公约
item.description: 荷兰政府要求欧盟退出其移民和庇护协议，因为新的右翼内阁正在推行该国有史以来最严格的移民政策。【原文：The Dutch government asked the European Union to opt out of its migration and asylum agreement as the new right-wing cabinet pushes for the country’s strictest ever immigration policies.】

item.title: 中国汽油出口下降，流量被视为亏损
item.description: 由于利润率骤降和配额即将用完，中国的汽油出口降至 4 月份以来的最低点。【原文：Gasoline exports from China fell to the lowest since April due to a plunge in margins and quota that is fast running out.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长瓦斯莱将寻求斯洛文尼亚央行行长的新任期
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员 Bostjan Vasle 表示，他将寻求在斯洛文尼亚中央银行掌舵人的职位上连任六年。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Bostjan Vasle said he’d seek a second six-year term at the helm of Slovenia’s central bank.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行应继续降低利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行应继续降低利率，因为明年通胀率将持久恢复到 2%。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue to lower rates as inflation is set to return durably to 2% next year, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】
